blockers.displayName: MFA Enforcement for Resource Write Actions

blockers.impact: Resource group creation blocked without 9 required tags
Blocks VM SKUs, AKS, VMSS, OpenAI, SQL without AAD — none apply to SWA+Cosmos

warnings.notes: DDoS protection disabled; FTPS checks disabled
Includes Function Apps diagnostic settings audit

autoRemediation.displayName: JV - Inherit Multiple Tags from Resource Group
autoRemediation.impact: Auto-copies 9 tags from RG to child resources
autoRemediation.action: Tags auto-inherited — no per-resource tagging needed in Bicep

autoRemediation.displayName: Cosmos DB - Disable Local Auth (Safe Secrets Standard)
autoRemediation.impact: Auto-sets disableLocalAuth=true on Cosmos DB accounts
autoRemediation.action: MUST use Entra ID RBAC (managed identity) — connection strings will be disabled

changes.bicep: Enable system-assigned MI on SWA; assign Cosmos DB Built-in Data Contributor role
changes.api: Use @azure/identity DefaultAzureCredential instead of connection strings

autoRemediation.displayName: Storage Account - Disable Blob Anonymous Access
MCAPSGov Deploy and Modify Policies (27 rules)
autoRemediation.notes: Most rules target VMs, Storage, EventHub, ServiceBus, Cognitive Services — none apply

notApplicable.description: ArcBox policies scoped to rg-arcbox-swc01 — different resource group
SQL/Arc SQL protection — using Cosmos DB, not SQL

mandatory.title: Resource Group Tags
mandatory.description: All 9 tags must be present on the resource group or deployment is denied

mandatory.title: Cosmos DB Entra ID RBAC Authentication
mandatory.description: Cosmos DB local auth (keys/connection strings) will be auto-disabled by policy. Must use managed identity + Entra ID RBAC.
bicepChanges: Enable system-assigned managed identity on SWA
Assign Cosmos DB Built-in Data Contributor role to SWA MI
Set disableLocalAuth: true in Cosmos DB resource
apiChanges: Initialize CosmosClient with aadCredentials instead of connection string
Store only COSMOS_ENDPOINT in app settings (no keys)

operational.title: MFA for Deployment
operational.description: Deployer must be MFA-authenticated. CI/CD service principals are exempt.

noActionRequired: Classic resource block — ARM resources only
SQL AAD-only auth — using Cosmos DB
Storage blob anonymous access — no Blob Storage
ArcBox policies — scoped to different RG
